description: This file defines a module for a sophisticated AI agent called DeepKnowledge, which performs iterative searches over a knowledge base to answer complex questions. It includes functions for initializing the knowledge base, creating the agent with detailed instructions, managing sessions, and running an interactive question-answering loop. The code imports various external modules and classes related to AI, knowledge management, and user interaction.

methods.name: initialize_knowledge_base
methods.description: Initializes the knowledge base with a URL-based knowledge source and a LanceDb vector database.

methods.name: get_agent_storage
methods.description: Returns a SqliteStorage instance for session management.

methods.name: create_agent
methods.description: Creates and configures a DeepKnowledge agent with detailed instructions, knowledge base, and storage.

methods.name: get_example_topics
methods.description: Provides a list of example questions for user interaction.

methods.name: handle_session_selection
methods.description: Manages user input to select or create a session ID.

methods.name: run_interactive_loop
methods.description: Runs an interactive loop allowing users to select questions or input custom queries, and displays agent responses.

methods.name: deep_knowledge_agent
methods.description: Main entry point to start the DeepKnowledge agent with session management and user interaction.
